title: Rider transfer ticker: Politt, Sivakov to UAE, Trentin, Storer, Dainese to Tudor, Schmid joins Jayco-AlUla, Bol, Gutiérrez extend
content:
Follow all the main moves of the 2023 'transfer window' for the men's and women's pelotons.

Read the full article at Rider transfer ticker: Politt, Sivakov to UAE, Trentin, Storer, Dainese to Tudor, Schmid joins Jayco-AlUla, Bol, Gutiérrez extend on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
